attributes.action: help stop troon youth centre being closed down
attributes.additional_details: South ayrshire council have decided to close down the one and only youth/community centre in troon, there have been a number of dedicated volunteers who between us have set up a comittee dedicating to taking over the troon youth centre in a bid to stop the closure and to keep providing the users of troon youth centre with a place to go. We will meet with south ayrshire council to put forward our proposal to tak over the lease but we need to show them how vital this centre is to the residents of troon please sign our peition today to show your support
